column1: though her skin and eyes were brown, she was long-waisted in a way not found among native islanders.
though her skin and eyes were black, she was long-waisted in a way not found among native islanders.
though her skin and eyes were dark, she was long-waisted in a way not found among native islanders.
though her skin and eyes were fair, she was long-waisted in a way not found among native islanders.
though her skin and eyes were light, she was long-waisted in a way not found among native islanders.
